text: Martial Supremacy
Enemies lacking skill find themselves increasingly unable to stand before the Champion Swordsmen.
Howl of the Pack
Under the Wolf Leader’s gaze, the pack rips apart the War God’s enemies with the virtue of courage.
Blood Debt
As rage takes over, the penitents honor their fallen comrades with the blood of their foes.
Lone Light of the Dark
In the endless night, the threat of the undead forges these hunters, who stand vigil as beacons of hope.
Epic Resolve
Members of the Golden Sons may not be the Empire's strongest warriors, but their passionate heroism drives them to spill their blood for the Empire.
Paragon of the Empire
Fighting alongside legends is the dream of every Imperial warrior. These great champions inspire armies with their every move.
Vow of Silence
As the winds of magic are severed and spells dissipate into the void, even the mightiest wizards perish in the oppressive silence.
Honor Guard
The Regiment of the Thousand stands as guardians of the temple and faithful followers of Sigmar, sworn to defend the Empire and its faith.
Tolling Requiem
Blood and fire rain down as steel and faith resonate, bringing divine retribution through sword and spear.
Saintly Redemption
The clash of blood and steel sparks a holy flame as the faithful fulfill their beliefs in battle.
Awakened Machine Spirit
The spirits embedded within the mechanisms roar back to life amidst blood and fire.
Feast of the Pack
The loyal beasts tear apart their unfortunate prey together.
Roaring Heatwave
The spinning holy casket emits waves of scorching steam, incinerating any who come near.
Imperial Guard
These eight legendary swordsmen swore upon joining the Emperor's guard to protect him to their last breath, a vow they will uphold for the rest of their lives.
Roar of Light
Sigmar's power leaps forth from their blades as the guards radiate divine light.
Vigil of Dawn
Even amidst endless darkness, there will always be those who stand watch for the dawn.
Walker of War
The scions of the Goddess of War dedicate their lives to mastering the art of battle and unleash their full might in the crucible of blood and steel.
Unwavering Devotion
As you chant hymns to Sigmar’s glory, the gaze of the God-King falls upon every loyal believer.
Arcane Chill
Though not true mages, the Dusk Knights wield the Eight Winds with skill to restrict their foes.
